explains: n. 再建，重建；改造；复兴

sentences.en: He said the task of reconstruction would demand much patience, hard work, and sacrifice.
sentences.cn: 他说重建工作会需要高度坚韧、勤劳和奉献。

sentences.en: A wave of deadly bombings has forced the United States to divert funds from reconstruction to security.
sentences.cn: 一系列致命的炸弹袭击迫使美国将资金从重建转向安全防御。

sentences.en: Work began on the reconstruction of the road.
sentences.cn: 重修这条路的工作已经开始了。
